title: USM AIMS FOR THE PRESERVATION AND CONSERVATION OF LOCAL KNOWLEDGE (Universiti Sains Malaysia)
text: ( Source : Universiti Sains Malaysia ) BANDUNG, 14 October 2015 - Preservation and conservation of the local indigenous knowledge, which is facing erosion due to modernisation, has become a priority for Universiti Sains Malaysia ( USM ) to
